tourBios.exmtStatus: Top 8, 1999 SENIOR PGA TOUR National Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.otherVics: 1977 and 1978 PGA Assistants Championship 1986 PGA Club Professional Championship 1993 Chile Open 1997 Long Island PGA Championship.
tourBios.carHigh: 1998: Attempted to qualify for the SENIOR TOUR in 1998, but finished T37 at Grenelefe Resort...Won the 1998 Beko Classic in Turkey in his second start on the PGA European Seniors Tour...Defeated Bob Verwey in a playoff with a birdie at Gloria Golf Resort.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Made 13 starts in his PGA TOUR career, five of them in 1987...Spent 26 years as a club professional, including stints at The Quechee Club in Vermont and Spring Rock Golf Center in New York...Played in 16 PGA Club Professional Championships and won the 1986 tournament at PGA West in LaQuinta, CA...Finished birdie-par on the final two holes to nip Bob Betley by a stroke...Played in six PGA Championships (1983, 1985, 1987, 1988, 1991 and 1994), never making the cut...Represented the United States on two PGA Cup teams (1983 and 1988)...Has two holes-in- one in competition.
tourBios.personal: A former collegiate golf teammate of PGA TOUR player Rex Caldwell at Cal-State Northridge...His mother lives with and takes care of his two retarded brothers and is his biggest hero...Took up golf because it was a non-contact sport, after getting injured playing high school football...Has played in the winter on the Australian, Asian and South African Tours.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Champions was T17th in 2000 at the Royal Caribbean Classic.
